name: OnePlus 15
highlights:
Not announced yet
8.5mm thickness
Android 16, ColorOS 16
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.SIM:
Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time)
Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM
BODY: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO AMOLED, 1B colors, 165Hz, 2160Hz PWM, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, HDR Vivid, 1800 nits (HBM)

PLATFORM.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (2x4.6 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix L + 6x3.62 GHz Oryon V3 Phoenix M)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.8, 24mm (wide), 1/1.56", 1.0µm, multi-directional PDAF, OIS
50 MP, f/2.8, 85mm (periscope telephoto), 1/2.76", 0.64µm, 3.5x optical zoom, PDAF, OIS
50 MP, f/2.0, 15mm, 120˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.76", 0.64µm, PDAF
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Laser focus, Hasselblad Color Calibration, color spectrum sensor, Dual-LED flash, HDR, panorama

COMMS.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6/7, dual or tri-band, Wi-Fi Direct
COMMS.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (G1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer

BATTERY.Charging:
120W wired, PD, QC
50W wireless
10W reverse wireless
5W reverse wired
